issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
hadoop-config.sh forces HADOOP_prefix to a specific value:
export HADOOP_PREFIX=`dirname "$this"`/..

It would be nice to make this overridable.

comments.body: Please find attached a patch for this issue

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12502251/HADOOP-7801.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 7 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/357//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/357//artifact/trunk/hadoop-common-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-common.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/357//console

This message is automatically generated.

I noticed this issue actually happens in a few more files. 
So I did a search and replace and please find attach a patch which should fix this for these additional files.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12502579/HADOOP-7801-2.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/359//console

This message is automatically generated.

+1 This is a reasonable change.

Nit: the change to fuse_dfs_wrapper.sh is not needed since HADOOP_PREFIX is only assigned if it empty or unset.

Thank you very much for your review!
Please find attach a new patch fixing the issue you noticed.
Rather than removing my change to fuse_dfs_wrapper.sh, I removed the enclosing if statement in order to have a consistent handling of HADOOP_PREFIX across all hadoop scripts.
Please, let me know if this is an issue.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12502790/HADOOP-7801-3.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/362//console

This message is automatically generated.
HEre is another patch with only changes to hadoop-common project. I will link other jiras for the other projects
See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-2543
See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-3372

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12502828/HADOOP-7801-4.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 7 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/365//artifact/trunk/hadoop-common-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-common.html

I've just committed this. Thanks, Bruno!
